name: Canadian Red Cross Basic Disaster Preparedness 4-Person Kit.
description: Be prepared should disaster strike. This kit comes with the necessary essentials for a family of 4 to help shelter, warm, feed and signal for help.Biohazard bag, 8 dust masks and a pair of nitrile gloves for personal protection.4x 10-pack of emergency tissues.Multifunction knife with can opener, toothpick, tweezers, nail file, corkscrew, saw scissors, and Phillips and flathead screwdrivers.40-hour candle and 4, 12-hour glow sticks provide a dependable source of light.4 multipurpose mylar sheets and blankets reflect heat and light.4 emergency rain ponchos are reusable and compact.CRC multifunction LED flashlight is powered by solar, hand-crank, or mobile charger. Includes AM/FM radio, compass and siren.SOS sign fits in the window of your vehicle or house.Includes 4x 3600 calorie food bars, 10L water container and 4 water purification tablets.CRC Personal First Aid kit with everything you need to treat minor wounds.CRC backpack holds entire kit, with reflective band across top for increased visibility.Packed dimensions are 40 x 36 x 26cm.
